overview: Markoni has repented for his life of crime and now lives in a secluded valley with his wife, Ningrum, and a servant. But Karto, his old gang member, asks him to return to crime and asks about Markoni’s treasure from past robberies. When Markoni refuses him, Karto, aka Aria Geni, sends his men to attack Markoni’s house when he is not home. Ningrum is raped and murdered along with the servant.
title: Pertarungan Iblis Merah
